title: University of Jake Paul, Target’s Shipt Show 2.20.20
itunes:title: University of Jake Paul, Target’s Shipt Show 2.20.20
description:
In episode 573, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, Black Men Can't Jump podcast co-host, and Astronomy Club member Jerah Milligan to discuss Mike Bloomberg's transphobia, the possible resignation of William Barr, how Susan Collins is going in the polls, how the impeachment trial affected Trump's approval ratings, Kickstarter unionizing, Shipt, BoneLESS wings, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Human Rights Campaign says Bloomberg should apologize for comments about transgender people
  2. Barr Privately Says He May Resign Over Trump’s Tweets About Roger Stone Case
  3. Colby College poll shows Collins, Gideon tied in hypothetical match-up
  4. Impeachment Didn’t Change Minds — It Eroded Trust
  5. YouTuber Jake Paul Launches Entrepreneur How-To Platform, Financial Freedom Movement
  6. Kickstarter employees vote to unionize
  7. Shipt: How this 32-year-old high school dropout built a business that sold to Target for $550 million
  8. 'Every Single Person Is Losing Money': Shipt Is the Latest Gig Platform to Screw Its Workers
  9. Starting the decade with a splash: Say hi to the new Shipt. 
  10. Target's Delivery App Workers Describe a Culture of Retaliation and Fear
  11. Bone Thugs-N-Harmony Change Name to Boneless Thugs-N-Harmony (for Buffalo Wild Wings)
  12. WATCH: Sam Wilkes - Tonight

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
